All rights reserved., 22996=If you like Sublime, Pepper, Slightly Stoopid, The Expendables, or any White boy reggae this cd is absolutely a must for you. Every single track is amazing! From start to finish this CD makes your body move. Im waiting for the EP thats supposedly released in December. If its half as good as this I would be happy. Check out the guest MC's on this album too-Tippa Irie, Chapter 11, No Needz, Stateside, and my favorite band Orange grove on Remedy. Hands down Remedy is the strongest song on this album. This is a party CD! A beach CD! Just the best cd i bought this year. I did buy pepper, the expendables and slightly stoopids and this one is still in our player! Check them out.}

textAfterTable: 12 Songs Customer Reviews The Best Reggae Album of 2007 hands down           by TattooedSoul If you like Sublime, Pepper, Slightly Stoopid, The Expendables, or any White boy reggae this cd is absolutely a must for you. Every single track is amazing! From start to finish this CD makes your body move. Im waiting for the EP thats supposedly released in December. If its half as good as this I would be happy. Check out the guest MC's on this album too-Tippa Irie, Chapter 11, No Needz, Stateside, and my favorite band Orange grove on Remedy. Hands down Remedy is the strongest song on this album. This is a party CD! A beach CD! Just the best cd i bought this year. I did buy pepper, the expendables and slightly stoopids and this one is still in our player! Check them out. Gotta Have It!!!!           by Squirrelmaster007 One of the best reggae albums to come out in a looooong time. Fresh
